name: groq_chat
description: AI-powered chat using Groq API with context management. Usage: @JackyBot [message]

name: ai_audio
description: AI audio generation and processing. Usage: !music [prompt]

name: voice_chat
description: Voice chat integration and management. Usage: !voice_chat or !vc

name: record
description: Record voice channels. Usage: !record, !stop

name: music_wavelink
description: Play music using Wavelink. Usage: !play [query], !skip

name: movies
description: Movie watchlist and suggestions. Usage: !movies

name: freegames
description: Track free game offers. Usage: !freegames. Requires channel: free-games

name: trivia
description: Play trivia games. Usage: !trivia

name: lovescore
description: Calculate love compatibility. Usage: !love @user @user

name: aura
description: Track aura points for users. Usage: !aura

name: gyat
description: GYAT meme commands. Usage: !gyat

name: triggered
description: Generate triggered memes. Usage: !triggered (reply to image)

name: homelander
description: Homelander meme generator. Usage: !homelander [text]

name: server_manager
description: AI-powered server management and analytics. Usage: !server_manager_status

name: role_management
description: Manage server roles and permissions. Usage: !roles

name: poll
description: Create and manage polls. Usage: !poll or !p

name: suggestions
description: Server suggestion system. Usage: !suggestions or !suggest

name: highlights
description: Highlight messages and notifications. Usage: !highlight_stats

name: timezone
description: Timezone conversion utilities. Usage: !time

name: randomnumber
description: Generate random numbers. Usage: !rand

name: context_manager
description: Manage AI conversation context. Background service - no command needed

name: punisher
description: Moderation and punishment system. Usage: !punisher [text]

name: zen_updates
description: Zen browser update notifications. Automatic - no command needed. Requires channel: zen-updates

name: steamos_updates
description: SteamOS update notifications. Usage: !steamos_latest. Requires channel: steamos-updates

name: help
description: Bot help and command information. Usage: !help
